name: die Familie Boutique Card Set
description: 4"x6" boutique art cards 14 cards per set Edition of 50 in a signed box A highly regrettable series of "hysterical reenactment" family portraits featuring the artists from ZeroFriends including Alex Pardee, Skinner, Dave Correia, Jonathan Wayshak, Robert Bowen, Chloe Rice & Quake. Each numbered set includes a total of fourteen 4"x6" boutique art cards portraying the various members of the peculiar NullFreund Familie. All cards have the curious stories of each colorful character printed on the reverse side. The set comes in a specially oversized black box, containing the complete set of cards wrapped in a thick layer of black tissue sealed with a gold foil sticker bearing the Familie mark. All cards are offset printed and sealed with a gloss varnish. The 4"x6" cards are perfect for framing or would make wonderful gifts for your dark hearted loved ones. For larger views of the portraits from this series, please see our die Familie tumblr site where you will also find all of the sorted stories.

name: The Last Good Man
description: 6.5"x10" image (8.5"x11 paper) hand signed, open edition (includes shipping in the U.S.) This portrait of artist Scott Musgrove was created in March of 2012 as part of our on-going artist portrait series. We were paying tribute to Musgrove's kind-hearted paintings of mythical, extinct beasts by placing him as the character in his own narrative. ** This photo portrait was created in 2012, before Hurricane Sandy (from last year) and Typhoon Haiyan, to express our concern for the planet's fragility and our belief that the human species has the strength to face this challenge with intelligence and dignity. We hope you agree. We are deeply saddened by the devastating effects of Typhoon Haiyan. Though we are on the other side of the Pacific, we care for our community at large and want to participate in their recovery. We thought it important to open up this print once again and donate all profits from the sale to Doctors Without Borders.

name: Hubris (Scott Musgrove) METALLIC
description: 8"x10", metallic paper edition of 35 12 available at this price hand signed and numbered Portrait of painter and sculptor Scott Musgrove as he embodies the beginning of his journey to discover his fabled lost creatures. Shown as part of our solo show Smoke & Mirrors at Varnish Fine Art, Art Miami: CONTEXT, and featured in Lurzer's Archive 200 Best Digital Artists Worldwide. These are 8"x10" prints on Moab Slickrock Metallic Pearl 260. Prints are hand signed and numbered and come with a certificate of authenticity. Additional Sizes Please contact us for larger-sized limited edition prints.

name: Ruminate
description: 12"x18", edition of 25 9 available at this price hand signed and numbered These are archival pigment prints on Moab Exhibition Lasal Luster 300. Prints are hand signed, numbered, and come with a certificate of authenticity. Larger Prints Please contact us directly for larger-sized limited edition prints.

name: Baited Breath
description: 12"x18", edition of 25 9 available at this price hand signed and numbered These are archival pigment prints on Moab Exhibition Lasal Luster 300. Prints are hand signed, numbered, and come with a certificate of authenticity. Larger Prints Please contact us directly for larger-sized limited edition prints.

name: Tartufi - Demons
description: 30"x13", edition of 20 7 available at this price hand signed and numbered SF-based indie rock stars Tartufi helped us to capture the visual representation of their musical stylings, embodied best by them battling their own road demons. These are archival pigment prints on Moab Exhibition Lasal Luster 300. Prints are hand signed, numbered, and come with a certificate of authenticity.

name: Monster Hunter
description: 18"x24", edition of 10 3 available at this price hand signed and numbered Our portrait of artist Alex Pardee taming his inner monster. These are archival pigment prints on Moab Exhibition Lasal Luster 300. Prints are hand signed, numbered, and come with a certificate of authenticity. Larger Prints Please contact us directly for larger-sized limited edition prints.

name: The Day We Stopped
description: 22"x16", edition of 20 7 available at this price hand signed and numbered A snapshot of a two-woman road trip that has gone off the path. Additional scenes are available from this series. These are archival pigment prints on Moab Exhibition Lasal Luster 300. Prints are hand signed, numbered, and come with a certificate of authenticity. Larger Prints Please contact us directly for larger-sized limited edition prints.

name: Alone: The Waitress (II)
description: 24"x16", edition of 20 7 available at this price hand signed and numbered A look at how when our corporal body is exhausted and spent -- used up by the race in which we run -- but we find ourselves alone, it is here that we let down our guard and all that is left is our true self. An additional scene is available from this series. These are archival pigment prints on Moab Exhibition Lasal Luster 300. Prints are hand signed, numbered, and come with a certificate of authenticity. Larger Prints Please contact us directly for larger-sized limited edition prints.

name: To the Quick
description: 12"x18", edition of 100 hand signed and numbered This photo was created for our participation in PangeaSeed's The Great West Coast Migration Tour, a traveling show to bring awareness about the destructive practice of shark "finning." A portion of the proceeds will be donated in support of PangeaSeed to bring an end to the practice of slaughtering sharks for their fins. These are archival pigment prints on Moab Exhibition Lasal Luster 300. Limited edition prints are hand signed, numbered, and come with a certificate of authenticity. Larger Prints Please contact us directly for larger-sized limited edition prints.

name: Orthros Sapien
description: 6"x9", open edition, hand signed The "self portrait" of Ransom & Mitchell -- or at least what it feels like sometimes in our heads. Originally available at our Smoke & Mirrors show at Varnish Fine Art. This is an archival pigment print on Moab Exhibition Lasal Luster 300. Limited edition prints are hand signed, numbered, and come with a certificate of authenticity. Larger Prints Please contact us directly for limited edition prints.

name: Special Offers
